mapper.insert: insert into t_order (member_id, orderDate, orderType, orderStatus, setmeal_id) value (#{memberId}, #{orderDateString}, #{orderType}, #{orderStatus}, #{setmealId})
mapper.select: SELECT m.`name` as 'member', s.`name` as 'setmeal', o.orderDate as 'orderDate', o.orderType as 'orderType' FROM t_order o LEFT JOIN t_member m ON o.member_id = m.id LEFT JOIN t_setmeal s ON o.setmeal_id = s.id WHERE o.id = #{id}
